# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC1-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1068/org/openo/common-tosca/model-designer/modeldesigner/distribution/modeldesigner-standalone/1.0.0-RC1/modeldesigner-standalone-1.0.0-RC1-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz && tar -xf common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC1-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC1-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8202
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1068 > VERSION
